periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and midnight. Partly cloudy. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Partly sunny. High near 89, with temperatures falling to around 86 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 70. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
